mapper.select: select t1.FNUMBER from T_BD_ACCOUNT t1, T_BD_ACCOUNT_L t2 where t1.FACCTID = t2.FACCTID and t2.FNAME = #{name}
select t1.FACCTID, t2.FFULLNAME, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FITEMDETAILID from T_BD_ACCOUNT t1, T_BD_ACCOUNT_L t2 where t1.FACCTID = t2.FACCTID and t2.FLOCALEID = 2052
select t1.FNUMBER as number, t2.FNAME as name from T_BD_ACCOUNT t1, T_BD_ACCOUNT_L t2 where t1.FACCTID = t2.FACCTID and t2.FLOCALEID = 2052
SELECT t.FNUMBER as number, tl.FNAME as name FROM T_BD_ACCOUNT t, T_BD_ACCOUNT_L tl WHERE t.FACCTID = tl.FACCTID AND t.FISBANK = 1 AND tl.FLOCALEID=2052
